Coat Rack with Built-in Umbrella Stand: Include a built-in umbrella stand to keep umbrellas from dripping water onto the floor, and to prevent users from forgetting their umbrellas when leaving the house.
Coat Rack with Personalized Hooks: Offer customizable hooks that can be personalized with names or initials, making it easy to identify which coat belongs to whom.
Coat Rack with Integrated Locking Mechanism: Add a built-in locking mechanism to secure valuable items like wallets, keys, and phones, providing an added layer of security.
Coat Rack with Adjustable Shelving: Include adjustable shelving that can be adjusted to accommodate different coat lengths and sizes, making it more versatile for a variety of users.
Coat Rack with LED Lighting: Add LED lighting to the coat rack to help users see their coats and accessories more clearly in low-light conditions.
